name: Icon
description: Scalable vector icons supporting multiple families, variants, duotone rendering, auto-sizing, and accessible labels.

do: Use icons to reinforce meaning alongside text
Provide accessible labels for standalone icons
Use consistent icon sizes relative to surrounding text
Use duotone variants for emphasis in key areas
dont: Don't use icons alone without labels for critical actions
Don't mix icon families inconsistently within the same context
Don't use overly decorative icons that reduce clarity

variants.name: Solid
variants.description: Filled icon style for primary emphasis

variants.name: Regular
variants.description: Outlined icon style for general use

variants.name: Light
variants.description: Thin line icon style for subtle UI

variants.name: Duotone
variants.description: Two-tone icon with adjustable opacity layers

props.name: name
props.description: Icon name from the icon library

props.name: color
props.description: Icon color (inherits from parent by default)

props.name: autoWidth
props.description: Auto-adjust width based on icon content

accessibility.guideline: Informational icons must have an accessible label
Icon color should not be the sole means of conveying information
